text: Fathi Shaqaqi was the leader and founder of Palestinian Islamic Jihad. He was born in the Gaza Strip on the 4th of January 1951 to a family of refugees. He founded Islamic Jihad in 1981 with the goal of starting a Islamic state under sharia law in Israel and Palestine. His inspiration was based off of a mix of Khomeinism and Salafism. ==References== Category:Assassinated Palestinian people Category:1995 deaths Category:1951 births
title: Fathi Shaqaqi
